title: My world: water
creator_credit: Paul Fillinger, Chevron Chemical Co and Churchill Films
brief_description: A montage of experiences related to the uses and delights of water. Explores the water cycle, importance of water to life, how water gets to our homes, the uses of water and the need for conservation. Uses songs, children’s voices and imaginative photography to highlight importance of water to us. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
